articles.description: Follow live text updates and radio commentary of the 153rd Open Championship from Royal Portrush in Northern Ireland.
articles.title: The Open round one: Follow live text and radio commentary from Royal Portrush Golf Club

articles.description: Liverpool are in advanced talks to sign Eintracht Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike in a deal worth more than £70m.
articles.title: Hugo Ekitike: Liverpool close in on Eintracht Frankfurt striker in £70m-plus

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions will field an all-Scottish fly-half and centre trio for the first time in history when they play Australia in the opening Test on Saturday.
articles.title: Lions v Australia: Finn Russell, Sione Tuipulotu & Huw Jones start first Test

articles.description: Canada forward Olivia Smith becomes the most expensive signing in women's football history by completing a £1m move from Liverpool.
articles.title: Olivia Smith: Arsenal sign Liverpool forward for world record £1m fee

articles.description: Fly-half Tom Lynagh will emulate his father, the Wallaby great Michael, when he starts for Australia in Saturday's first Test against the British and Irish Lions.
articles.title: Australia team news: Tom Lynagh to start at fly-half in first Lions Test

articles.description: Follow live text updates on stage 12 of the Tour de France from Auch to Hautacam.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 LIVE: Stage 12 route, standings & updates, with Pogacar 'cleared to continue'

articles.description: Newcastle are expected to accelerate their interest in Brentford striker Yoane Wissa in the next 24 hours after withdrawing from their pursuit of Hugo Ekitike.
articles.title: Yoane Wissa: Newcastle accelerate interest in Brentford striker

articles.description: For the first time in more than 100 years, no Welshman will be involved when the British and Irish Lions play a Test match.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Welsh rugby reels from Jac Morgan omission blow

articles.description: All the latest transfer news with Hugo Ekitike and Alexander Isak subject to interest and Bournemouth sign Djordje Petrovic from Chelsea.
articles.title: Transfer news: Ekitike, Isak latest plus Bournemouth sign goalkeeper

articles.description: Deepti Sharma's unbeaten 62 guides India to a four-wicket win in the opening one-day international in Southampton.
articles.title: England vs India: Deepti Sharma guides tourists to four-wicket win in opening ODI
